faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about {{PRODUCT_NAME}}.

items.question: How does the free trial work?
items.answer: Start with our free plan — no credit card required. Upgrade anytime when you need more features.

items.question: Can I cancel my subscription?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel anytime from your dashboard. You'll continue to have access until the end of your billing period.

items.question: Do you offer refunds?
items.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day money-back guarantee for all paid plans. No questions asked.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept all major credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, Amex) and process payments securely through Stripe.

items.question: Is my data secure?
items.answer: Absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption and follow industry best practices for data security.
